CHAT.comment: MOT and Chi worked together on this task , with no help from EXP. EXP did not talk at all , and Chi talked very little. Mot did most of the talking. Chi first asked Mot what to write , and Mot prompted Chi to come up with his own ideas. At one point , MOT suggested one sentence , which he used. Later she suggested he ask about the author's sister , which he did. Mot also helped with punctuation and capitalization. Otherwise , Chi worked very independently. Mot was very supportive , patient , and encouraging.

u.a: bef sounds as if EXP is setting up activity
aft maybe Chi whistles , more activity sounds
as in you made a mistake
maybe why don'tcha ask him . . . and why don't is swallowed or omitted
bef loud bang , maybe microphone fell , cutting off beginning of this utterance
bef and aft lots_of loud , indistinguishable noises
another child enters and asks for Chi's sister , and Mot talks to her very briefly
bef Chi is busy writing , and erased once
